title: Ben Marcus Reads Mary Gaitskill
description: Ben Marcus joins Deborah Treisman to read and discuss Mary Gaitskill’s “A Dream of Men,” from a 1998 issue of the magazine.
content:encoded: Ben Marcus reads and discusses "A Dream of Men," by Mary Gaitskill.
